---
title: "Projects"
listing:
  contents: projects.yml
  type: default
  sort: "date asc"
  fields: [image, date, title, description]
  field-display-names:
    date: true
page-layout: full
---

```{r setup}
#| include: false
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{css}
.listing-item {
  display: flex;
  border: 1px solid #e2e8f0;
  border-radius: 0.5rem;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  background: white;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  align-items: flex-start;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.listing-item:hover {
  box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.1);
  border-color: #60a5fa;
}

.listing-image {
  flex-shrink: 0;
  width: 200px;
}

.listing-image img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 150px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-radius: 0.375rem;
  border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
}

.listing-content {
  flex-grow: 1;
}

.listing-title {
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  line-height: 1.4;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.listing-title a {
  text-decoration: none;
  color: #1f2937;
}

.listing-title a:hover {
  color: #2563eb;
}

.listing-date {
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  color: #6b7280;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.listing-description {
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: #4b5563;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .listing-item {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 1rem;
  }
  
  .listing-image {
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .listing-image img {
    height: 200px;
  }
}
```
